desc: Create PDF, DOCX and ebook files with pictures and spoken words taken from video. Convert speech to text from video. Capture pictures from video. Transcribe video. Extract images, words and text from video. Conversion and transcription service. Transcript MS Word, pdf, doc, docx, epub, e-book, eBook. Upload video.

layout.text: Create PDF, DOCX and eBook files with pictures and spoken words taken from your video.
